effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 564,824 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 280,058.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Offer to bind your spirit with that of another player also wearing this ring. This binding is permanent, but can be severed at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 751,764, and grants you up to 11,701 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)

item.name: Taesavir, Sword of the Grand Design

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Taesavir, Sword of the Grand Design

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
